Properties.Name: Text
Properties.Value:
This Workflow retrieves customers from Xero, checks if each has already been processed using a Key-Value store, and if not, maps and sends their data to BambooHR to create an employee. 
Success or error states are logged, and errors trigger an Email Alert. 
The process ensures each customer is only processed once.

Nodes.Name: VariableBar
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are setting the Key-Value Group

Nodes.Name: Formatter
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we display a message if the Customer ID has been found in the Key Values

Nodes.Name: SetKeyValue2
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we write away a Successful Key Value record, so that this specific employee(key) is not processed by this integration again.

Nodes.Name: Xero
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are retrieving a List of Customers from Xero

Properties.Name: Response

{
  "Contacts": [
    {
      "ContactID": "Xero identifier (string)",

      "ContactStatus": "ACTIVE/ARCHIVED/GDPRREQUEST. Current status of a contact – see contact status types (string)",

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Value: Allows you to retrieve all contacts in a Xero organisation

Nodes.Name: ForEach
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are using a For Each node to iterate through each customer record found in the Xero response payload.

Nodes.Name: GetKeyValue2
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we check the Key value records to see if this records has been processed before. If nothing found, it will process.

Nodes.Name: QuickMap
Nodes.LongDescription: We are using the Quickmap node to do some validations and format the payload into a Sage friendly format. Note the change to the CustomerID, which is now our Key.

Nodes.Name: BambooHR
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we use the BambooHR node to retrieve a list of Employees.

Nodes.Name: IfVisualBasic
Nodes.LongDescription: We check to see if the create in Sage was Successful or not.

Nodes.Name: SetKeyValue2
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we write away an Error Key Value record, so that if this employee(Key) get's processed again, it will try and run the update again, until this changes to Successful.

Properties.Name: Expression
Properties.Value:
Please see details for the error returned from below:

"{Error}"

Properties.Name: Subject
Properties.Value: Employee Failed to Create in BambooHR.

Name: Xero to BambooHR Employees
Description: This Workflow retrieves customers from Xero and checks a Key-Value store to determine if they've already been processed. If not, it maps and sends their data to BambooHR to create an employee, logs the outcome, and sends an Email Alert for any errors—ensuring each customer is processed only once.
